sections.code:
#like-bar.ytd-sentiment-bar-renderer { background: #009900!important; } /* Like bar */
#container.ytd-sentiment-bar-renderer { background: #FF2929!important; } /* Dislike bar */
ytd-menu-renderer ytd-toggle-button-renderer.style-default-active[is-icon-button]:nth-of-type(1) { color: #009900; } /* Liked button */
ytd-menu-renderer ytd-toggle-button-renderer.style-default-active[is-icon-button]:nth-of-type(2) { color: #FF2929; } /* Disliked button */

/*
/* CUSTOM CURSOR
/* Cursor - Plain Black - KMV
/* https://userstyles.org/styles/175086/
/*
/* Themes by KMV:
/* https://userstyles.org/users/370722
/*
/* Contact - https://www.reddit.com/r/KMV/
*/
html,
body,
div
{
    cursor: url("data:image/x-icon;base64,"), default !important;
}

/*Link Hover*/

a:hover,
a:hover *,
button:hover,
paper-button#label:hover,
paper-button.yt-next-continuation:hover,
paper-item:hover,
yt-icon-button:hover,
ytp-bottom:hover,
ytd-single-option-survey-option-renderer:hover,
ytd-toggle-theme-compact-link-renderer:hover,
#button:hover,
#content > form:nth-child(3) > input:nth-child(6):hover,
#dismissable.ytd-video-renderer *,
#dismissable.ytd-video-renderer *:hover,
#icon-label:hover,
#more style-scope.ytd-vertical-list-renderer,
#more yt-formatted-string.style-scope.ytd-vertical-list-renderer,
#show-more-button.ytd-rich-shelf-renderer:hover,
#tabsContent *:hover,
#thumbnail,
.more-button:hover, .less-button:hover,
.paper-icon-button:hover,
.iv-branding .branding-img-container img:hover
.yt-dropdown-menu:hover,
.yt-simple-endpoint:hover,
.ytd-badge-supported-renderer,
.ytd-menu-service-item-renderer:hover,
.ytd-subscribe-button-renderer:hover
{
    cursor: url("data:image/png;base64,"), default !important;
}

/*Click*/
a:active,
a:active *,
button:active,
paper-button#label:active,
paper-button.yt-next-continuation:active,
paper-item:active,
yt-icon-button:active,
ytp-bottom:active,
ytd-single-option-survey-option-renderer:active,
ytd-toggle-theme-compact-link-renderer:active,
#button:active,
#content > form:nth-child(3) > input:nth-child(6):active,
#dismissable.ytd-video-renderer *:active,
#icon-label:active,
#more style-scope.ytd-vertical-list-renderer:active,
#more yt-formatted-string.style-scope.ytd-vertical-list-renderer:active,
#show-more-button.ytd-rich-shelf-renderer:active,
#tabsContent *:active,
#thumbnail:active,
.iv-branding .branding-img-container img:active,
.more-button:active, .less-button:active,
.paper-icon-button:active,
.yt-dropdown-menu:active,
.yt-simple-endpoint:active,
.ytd-badge-supported-renderer:active,
.ytd-menu-service-item-renderer:active,
.ytd-subscribe-button-renderer:active

{
    cursor: url("data:image/png;base64,"), default !important;
}

input
{
    cursor:text!important;
}
